problem.p: Two carts, A and B, on frictionless air tracks are initially at rest. Cart A is twice as massive as cart B. Now you exert the same constant force on both carts for 1 second. One second later, the momentum of cart A is:

choice.name: foil1
choice.p: Twice the momentum of cart B

choice.name: foil2
choice.p: Half the momentum of cart B

choice.name: foil3
choice.p: The same as the momentum of cart B
